attributes.action: Prevent Donald Trump from making a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Nearly 2 million people signed a similar petition 2 years ago but the Government declined. This triggered hundreds of thousands of people to join protests against the President visiting. The government should learn from last time that the UK does not want Donald Trump making an Official State Visit!
attributes.background: Donald Trump should not be allowed to enter the UK to make an official state visit, he should only be allowed to enter as Head Of The US Government.
